name: R70DateColumnLessThanAndColumnInSet
displayName: R70 Date Column Less Than And Column In Set
description: Check that the Date column is less than X years and the second column in the set has an error.

parameterDefinition.name: dateColumn
parameterDefinition.description: Date column to check X years.

parameterDefinition.name: yearTestDateColumn
parameterDefinition.description: Number of years to check with Date column.

parameterDefinition.name: secondColumn
parameterDefinition.description: The Column to test in set.

parameterDefinition.name: secondColumnTestValues
parameterDefinition.displayName: Values to test with Second column
parameterDefinition.description: the set of Values to test with Second column. Separated by |. For example: CCCD|CMTND.
